title: ABM Calibration and Validation Report
description: The purpose of the report was to compare activity-based model (ABM) outputs with observed survey data using interactive visuals.  The report features an overview of the ABM and sections for each topic within calibration and validation.
map: Yes (including choropleth and linked with charts)
data: Data sources include CMAP ABM 2010 and 2015 scenarios, PUMS 2007-2011 data, PUMS 2013-2017 data, CMAP 2007-2008 Travel Tracker Survey,  CTPP 2009-2013 data, CTPP 2012-2016 data, Illinois Travel Statistics 2015, Annual Average Daily Count Data 2015, and RTAMS 2015-2016 data.
tools: This project was written using JavaScript packages D3.js and Leaflet.js, as well as Bootstrap for the layout.  The site is hosted using GitHub Pages.
text: Includes instructional text, notes on data and visuals, and narrative for interpreting visuals
staff: Aaron Brown, Brittaney Harkness, Sarah Buchhorn, Joseph Nardi (intern), Craig Heither

title: TIP Atlas
description: The TIP Atlas allows the user to create reports based on various criteria.
data: The data for this tool comes from the TIP.
tools: This project was built in Python for ArcGIS Pro.
